    Helper class to download/upload remote files.

      • downloadRemoteFile

        public static long downloadRemoteFile(@Nonnull
                                      java.net.URI remoteUri,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      java.io.File location)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Download the specified file from the remote location.
        Parameters:
        remoteUri - - URI of the HTTP endpoint to download from.
        location - - Local File to create.
        Returns:
        - Number of file bytes read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • downloadRemoteDirectory

        public static long downloadRemoteDirectory(@Nonnull
                                           java.net.URI remoteUri,
                                           @Nonnull
                                           java.io.File directory)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Download the directory content from a remote location. Directory content is expected to be zipped.
        Parameters:
        remoteUri - - URI of the HTTP endpoint to download from.
        directory - - Local directory to write to.
        Returns:
        - Byte read (zipfile).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
